114b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// gsang sngags kyi sgo nas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i spyad pa spyod pas na de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams ming kho na gtsug gi nor bu ni// sangs rgyas spyi yon//
114b5(rgyud 'grel): tan pa tshang ba med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// chos thams cad kyi don yongs su rdzogs pas mnyams pa'o// lhag chad med pa zil gyis non par mi nus pa'o// gzhung dang / don 'chang ba dang / sa
114b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas glegs bam klog pa dang / sems pas kun chub par byed pa dang / bsgoms pas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa zil gyis mnan par bya ba ma
114b7(rgyud 'grel): yin pa nyid do// gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa ni/ gzi brjid nang du 'phro ba nor bu bdag nyid chen po'o// phyir zlog pa ni gnyen por gyur pa'o// snyigs ma lnga ni sems can dang / lta ba dang / bskal pa dang / tshe dang / yo byad kyi mtshan nyid
114b8(rgyud 'grel): do// drings dang / skur ba dang / smad pa'i tshig sngon du 'gro bas mi snyan pa brjod pa'o// yid du 'ong ba ni yid du 'thad pa'o// phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi rnga sgra rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i chos kyi rgyal po
115a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa/ chos kyi rgyal srid kyi bdag por 'gyur zhes 'brel pa'o// / oM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra a aHaM aHpra kri ti pa ri shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma/ ya tuta/ sar+b+ba
115a2(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na krA ya/ many+dza shI pa ri shud+d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ti A aHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to tri da ya ha ra ha ra/ o tAM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA namArti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA pA tsa/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar b+ha AH
115a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dang po dang / bar dang / tha mar byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de ltar yang / a'i rnam pa byang chub kyi sems so// se dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rang bzhin aH'i rnam pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid mtshon pa
115a4(rgyud 'grel): oM gi rnam pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gsal bar byed pa a'i rnam pa'o// ye shes kyi sku byin gyis rlob pa po a'i rnam pa'o// lus dang / sems dang ngag byin gyis rlob pa po a hUM hrIH'i yi ge'o// brtan pa dang ga ma
115a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ngo bo'i dngos po rnams chos rnams kyi dbyings// ngag gi dbang phyug gi bdag nyid ces pa'i don to// chos kyi sku rgyas gdab pa'i don du AH'i rnam pa tha mar brjod do// // de nas shes pa de ma thag tu'o// gang gis dang por
115a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab pa'i dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang des gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ zhes 'brel lo// de nyid kyi tshe bde ba skyes pas dga' zhing ngo // smad nas dga' ba skyes pas mgu nas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
115a7(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i legs pa'i lam chu 'phrul dra ba'i rmad kyi tshul bstan cing bshad pa'o// don chen rang bzhin gyi don 'byung ba'i rgyun no// la ma 'di yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul te/ spyod yul yin gyi/ gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes gnas
115a8(rgyud 'grel): so// rdo rje mtshan dpal phyag na snying po bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'grel chen rjes su 'gro// legs bsngags don za ba dag la brten cing rmad byung kha che'i dka' 'grel rgyas pa dbang por ldan// sna tshogs rgyud kyi gsang
115b1(rgyud 'grel): chen rnam par g.yo ldan gdams pa sna tshogs bdud rtsis rgyas gyur pa/ nyi ma'i dpal gyis mdor bshad 'di ni dam pa rnams kyi sems la kun nas rgyas gyur cig/ mdor bshad bdud rtsi'i thigs pa ma 'khrugs shing // yid
115b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od brtsams las bdag gis bsod nams ni// gang zhig thob pa de yis 'gro ba rnams// gnyis med bde ba dag dang ldan gyur cig// dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdor bshad bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya
115b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan nyi ma'i dpal ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po nor bu dpal ye shes dang / bla ma rje btsun rdo rje 'chang
115b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dpal nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba chag dge slong chos rje'i dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan pa phab pa'o// gsung rab snying po rang bzhin yon tan can// dpal mtshan yang dag brjod don
115b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa yi// gdams pa mchog gi gsal byed rgyan gyis mdzes// bong du sngar ma grags pa chos rjes bsgyur// de las dge ba gang bskrar de yi 'dir// dpal ldan bla ma bsten mkhas dbang po rno// sems rgyud legs sbyangs
115b6(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan 'dir 'jug cing // kun kyang 'di yi gnas la 'god par shog// @// sa dpa tshan 'a kyil 'dre gas sa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sa gI t+ya mr-i taM bin+d+ha pra t+ya lo ka
115b7(rgyud 'grel): br-id+d+hi n+da ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pasgon ma gsal ba zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yul dang yulaM nan mkha'
115b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dra rang bzhin can// nyi zla mun pa'i lam zhugs mda' yis g.yo// sa mtha' las byung chu yis kun tu khyab// bde gshegs 'jam dbyangs de la bdag phyag 'tshal// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa yi// bdud rtsi thigs pa
116a1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu 'di/ dang po sangs rgyas legs 'ongs pa// mtshan brjod man ngag bri bar bya// dpal ldan 'bras spangs mchod rten du// sna tshogs rgyud don gnyer ba yi// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
116a2(rgyud 'grel): rten 'das// sa ga'i bco lnga la 'dus so// de dus ston pas 'gro don du// chos dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi/ dkyil 'khor spros pa 'bras spangs yin// de yi phyi dang nang dag tu// dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor che// dang po
116a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor spros// lha la sogs pa thams cad la// dbang bskur byin te rgyud sde bzhi// snying po'i rgyud dang lnga po dag/ rdo rje 'chang gis rgyas par gsungs// snying po'i snying po 'di yin no// bsdus te mkha' 'gro ma rnams
116a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rang rang gnas su rgyas gdab bo// snying po'i snying po 'di de ni// 'gro ba'i don du 'dzam+bu'i gling // bye ba phrag brgyar glags grub tu// rab tu grags so 'di yi don// zab cing gting dpag dka' ba ni// sus kyang shes pa ma yin
116a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ zla ba bzang pos dri med bshad// de don rigs ldan rnams la ni// bdag gis rab tu dgrol bar bya// 'di la bcu bzhir gsungs pa yang // bcu gsum don ldan sgra yi dbyings// gcig ni kun gyis bsngags pa'o// de nyid
116a6(rgyud 'grel): phyiran 'dir mi 'chad// bshad par bya ba bcu gsum ni// zhus dang gsungs dang gzigs pa dang // rdzu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje dbyings// chos dbyings me long so so rtog/ mnyam nyid bya grub rgyud bsdus pa// sngags dang rjes su yi rang dang // bcu
116a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa// de las dang po thogs mar ni// zhus pa bcu drug bstan par bya// 'thad pa ston pa chos kyi sku// dz+wA lan+d+ha ra'i tha yig las// zhu po traM sha ku ni yaM// a yi ga rkyen pas chos kun byung // e ba ma ya zhes bshad
116a8(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de nyid rdo rje btsun mo yaM// b+ha ga lar zhugs de nyid do// de yang bshad pa/ de nas rdo rje 'chang dpal ldan// gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas dpa'// gsang dbang rdo rje dbang phyug
116b1(rgyud 'grel): po zhes pa/ a yi rnam pa bdag med ma// rab tu mi gnas stong pa nyid// rnam pa thams cad bral ba'o// tha yi rnam pa mi bskyod pa// dmigs med snying rje chen po la// sna tshogs dngos rnams snang ba'o// rdo rje gnyis med sbyor ba//
116b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / stong pa snying rje'i snying po can// zag gsum 'dzag pa med pa'o// 'chang ba zung 'jug de nyid ni// lhan cig 'dzin pas 'chang bar brjod// de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las// bsam pa thams cad yongs btang nas//
116b3(rgyud 'grel): stong par rtse gcig yid byed pa// nyi ma gcig tu brtags na yang // gal te yid ches ma gyur na// de tshe nga yi brdzun gyi tshig ces pas dam bca' gsungs pa'o// rtags gsum dang po bar tha ma// dang po du sogs lnga thob pa//
116b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa stong dang brgyad brgya 'gags// tha ma de nyi khri chig stong dang // drug brgya 'gags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal ni de las rang don gzhan// dam pa gnyis ni 'byung ba 'am// yang na gnyis med sbyor ldan pas// ril
116b5(rgyud 'grel): bu bum pa 'chil lham dang // sa 'og mkha' spyod rkang mgyogs dang // gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyi ler// de la sogs pa dpag med mchog/ gdul dka' yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung // khyad par rta pa'i tshogs chen po// nyi khri
116b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig stong drug brgya dang // stong dang brgyad brgya sum brgya dang // drug cu'i dmag dpung gdul dka' ba'o// ci'i phyir nyin mtshan gnod byed phyir// 'dul ba drug sogs dpag med kyang // kun gyis thul ba ma yin te// mchog tu mi
116b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag ye shes che// 'du byed rnams kyi mchog yin no// de ni gang las rnyed ce na// bum pa gtum mo lhan cig skyes// yan lag drug gis lus bcings pa'o// de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las// bye ba bcing ba'i sbyor ba yis//
116b8(rgyud 'grel): sa gsum po yang 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum gyi sgo gsum po// rgyal ba rang lus bde stong rgyas// khro rgyu can las thag bsrings pa// gsang ba gsang ba lnga yin te// de yang rdo rje theg pa
117a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med pa snyed par bya// brdzun gyi tshig ni smra ba yin// zlos par gyur pa'i khub btung // de ltar sbya
117a2(rgyud 'grel): nagrol bar 'gyur// zhes parlung ni srog yin pa// de 'gog byed pa sog chags gsod// gzhan gyi bud med rang lus mdzes// rang gis grub pa rnam par dag/ ma~M byin las thig la yin// sems can thams ca da
117a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes brdzun gyi tshig ni smra ba yin// bde ba phyag rgya'i khu ba ni// rtag tu btung bar bya ba yin// de lha min par dngos spyod pa// rdo rje dmyal bar nges par 'ching // dgongs pa'i skad kyis bstan pa yin// dbang po dbang po
117a4(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ da pa dran pa brtson pagrus dang // bas ma gtan shes rab ldan po yis// de rje theg pa la ma bsgrub pa'o// rdzogs ldan dbang b+ha ldan// de nyid byed na de dbang brag+sa/ rnam par rgyas pa rdo rje las// mi y-i gr-i
117a5(rgyud 'grel): ba mchog yin no// pad+ma rtsal dkar byon// thig le nam mkha'i khams gnas pa'o// sanA ni gsal bar snang ba ste// rtags dang ye shas ni dbre ba rtan// sna tshogs pad+mo rtsa yi dbyibs// gdan la bzhugs ni skye mched dag/
117a6(rgyud 'grel): rang ge lag ni rgyang gnyis// rdo rje'i mchog ni gnyis med ma// rnam grangs mngal rten nas ni// khams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir// gsor bar brtson 'grus gnyen po yis// yang dang yang dbyed ces pa// nyams su myong bar
117a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// khro gnyer dpral ba'i thig la la// dam pa ldan sogs bcu drug byed// nyams su myong bas ye shes 'phel// lag na rdo rje gnyen ye shes// thabs tshon mtha' yas rnyed pa yis// nyon mongs rnam dag gdul dka'
117a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dul/ de 'dul dpa' bo rnams kyi ni// phrin las gcig go zhes brjod pa'o// dpa' bo de 'joms phyir na dpa'// 'jigs su rung ba'i nyan rang sogs// 'dod yon spyod la skrag pa'o// gzugs ni gnod sbyi des ma
117b1(rgyud 'grel): thub/ mi thung byis pa'i lus 'chang ba// zhe sdang mi bskyod rdo rje nyid// ces gsungs so// rdo rje lus la rtse mo ni// spyi bo'i haM dang bupa pa'i a// rab 'phro ba ni yar mar gshegs// rang gi lag ni yan lag drug/ gsor byed pa
117b2(rgyud 'grel): ni srog rtsol sogs// gong nas gong du go mas byed po'o// de yang dgos pa ci'i phyir na// snying rje'i don gyi byang chub sems// de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro las// ji srid sems can 'khor gnas su// gnas par gyur pa'i bar
117b3(rgyud 'grel): dag tu/ dpal mchog mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin// de phyir sems dpa' don pa ni// srid pa'i nags pas rtag mi 'jigs// srid bde smon pa dgag pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'dod chags rab
117b4(rgyud 'grel): myos pas// rtog pa rgyas pas smin par mdzad// ces gsungs so// de lta'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// shes rab mi rtog chos kyi dbyings// yang na las dang ye shes gnyis// las ni bcos ma ye shes mchog/ de lta'i
117b5(rgyud 'grel): 'thad pa 'di nyid de// thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ 'dod chags chen po ces chags pa'am// so sor bsdu dang lha yi yum// de la brten nas rtogs pa'o// dga' dang bde ba'i ye shes nyid// mgu ba mi ngoms spangs pa'o//
117b6(rgyud 'grel): rangs pa de yi lus sems tshim// btang snyoms can ni thar pa 'dod// 'khor ba spong sogs gnyis rtog med// khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// zhes pa stong pa khro bo la// chags bral ye shes lhan skyes gzugs// de yang sangs
117b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas thod pa las// dngos po thams cad skyes par byed// stong pas gshig par byed pas te// gshig phyir drag po khro bo'i gzugs// slu ba'i ri dgas rnam par spangs// rang bzhin stong pa'i nam mkha' ni// dgod cing 'dzag pa ma
117b8(rgyud 'grel): yin no// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas mchog gi bde ba la// phrin las bde bas spro byed pa'o// don ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// lus btud nas ni ma nyams pa// lhan cig rdzogs pa yang dag rdzogs// 'dud ces pa ni/
118a1(rgyud 'grel): haM la'o// bcom ldan 'das ni yas byon pa// de bas rtog pa 'joms pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mas log pa'o// de nyid gnas su gshegs pa'o// rdzogs pa dung khang rdzogs pa la/
118a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spang bya spangs thob pa'o// phyag 'tshal zhes pa de la 'dud// thal mo rtsa dang rlung gnyis la// sbyar byas thig le 'phror mi ste// spyan sngar rdo rje bum pa'i nang // 'dug ste 'od 'phro thig le la// 'di skad gsol ni lta zhing
118a3(rgyud 'grel): snyems// khyab bdag 'phel sdug thig lel// bdag la sman pa mchog bde dang // dkar po'i phyogs la lus bde ba'o// gzhan don bde ba chen po la// rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i rten// thugs rtse bas ni rang lus kyi//
118a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni ma 'phros par// rtag tu mnyams ldan phyir ro// sgyu 'phrul dra bas dga' bcu drug/ mngon rdzogs dga' ba rnams thim pa'o// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// rnyed pa'i mi 'gyur
118a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes te// rang bzhin chos dbyings rnam dag pa// don mngon sum thob par mdzod// nyon mongs pas ni thig le nyams// 'khor ba rgyas par byas pa yi// sems 'khrul pas ni de sdug bsngal// sna tshogs rgyas par byas
118a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mi shes ma rig bag chags stobs// 'dam du bying ba rgal dka' ba// de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las// mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang // khengs pa la ni rtag tu dga'// rtag tu gdug sems ldan kun gyis// gsang ba'i
118a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul 'di mi shes// zhes gsungs so// sems can kun la nyi khri dang // tshig stong drug brgya lags pas na// sman pa bde chen dbyer med pa'o// bla med 'bras bu lhan skyes bde// de thob bya phyir dga' bzhi bsgom// rab
118a8(rgyud 'grel): tugasal ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// zhes pa rab gsal rang gzhan la// chos dang gzugs su gsal ba'o// de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan zag med ye shes la// ston pa thig le bde chen po/
118b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas spyi bo'i haM yig la// 'gro ba'i rlung gi las rnams so// bla ma thabs mchog me rlung sgor// gnyis med 'dres pa bde ba che// dam tshig chen po'i thig le bzhi// de nyid mkhyen pa ye shes so// dbang po bsam pa sgo
118b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi/ yul dang yul can snang ba'o// so sor sdud pas rtags thob pa// mkhyen mchog ces ni de la bya// bcom ldan 'das ni rtogs pa'i don// ye shes sku ni bzhi pa'i sku// nyams pa bzhi pa'i sku ma yin//
118b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor bde chen dpral ba'i haM// chen po e yi rnam pa can// baM las kA li'i phreng ba la// tshig gi bdag po zhes bshad do// ye shes gtsug tor thig le che// rang 'byung ba ni rgyu mi ltos// byas pa med cing rnam par spangs//
118b4(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid kyis rig bsod nams mchog/ dA rika pa'i zhal snga nas// skye ba med pa'i ye shes 'di// rdul med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu// lus gnas bde bas rgyas pa las// dA ri ka pas da lta rnyed// ces gsungs so// 'jam
118b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal nor ne'i thig le la// ye shes gnyis med bde ba'i rten// sems dpa' ling ga rgyas pa'o// ming ni bde chen lhan skyes te// yang dag brjod pa'i rgyud mngalas// mchog gi bsgrub bya dam par gsungs// don zab rtogs
118b6(rgyud 'grel): dka' mi 'gyur te// rdo rje theg pa'i bsgrub bya'ang // de'o// don ni rgya chen zheng zhes pa// lhan skyes dngos rnams khyab pa'o// don chen mtshungs med bzhi pa yi// dbang gis thob pa'i cig shos des// rab zhi pa ni phyag rgya che//
118b7(rgyud 'grel): nyan rang rnams ni skrag 'gyur ba'o// thog ma dga' bas dpa' ba ste// bar dang mchog dga'o tha mar ni// dga' bral dge ba lhan cig skyes// 'das pa thos pa'i dus dag tu// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa ni//
118b8(rgyud 'grel): bla mas gsungs pa thos nyams myong // ma 'ongs sgom pa'i dus dag tu// rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la ba pa// sgom pa nyams su myong ba'o// da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pas de don rtogs pa'o// yang
119a1(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du gsungs pa gang // rdo rje theg pa nyams su myong // rang la rang gis bstan pa'o// rgyud chen bde chen rgyud chags pa// sbas pa de kho na nyid do// rgyu 'phrul mngon par rtogs pa ste// dra
119a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsa dang thig ler 'brel// rdo rje 'chang chen ye shes sku// gsang sngags 'dzin ni bde chen gyi// ye shes lnga po gsal bar 'dzin// dpag med rnams ni lam bye brag/ bka' bzhin du ni kun du 'od// ma mthong bar du rlung 'gog
119a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// zhes ni glu yi yid tshim byed// de ltar rang nyid rtogs shing bde// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun ni// mchog tu mi 'gyur ye shes la// thig le bzhi pa'i mtha' can no//
119a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sbyor ba'i yan lag drug yin no// 'dzin pa thig le 'dzin pa ste// dga' bzhi ye shes rgyas par byas// nges par 'byung ni haM las skyes// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bar du ni// rab tu gsal
119a5(rgyud 'grel): pabar sems can la// ji ltar bar ni bstan par bya// bdag gis rlung gnyis sbyor ba yis// bsam pa brtan pos thig le gzung // de las phyag rgya chen po thob// nyon mongs nyams pa'i sdug bsngal la// ma lus gsal ba gcod
119a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / mi shes rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs// ma lus spang phyir dngos po bsten// bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// nyon mongs byang chub yan lag lam// de yang sangs rgyas thod pa las// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu
119a7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ khams gsum na ni sdig med pas// de bas 'dod la nan tan du// bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu gyis// zhes gsungs so// sems can thig ler gnas pa'o// de yang saM pu Ta las// 'di la bsal ba ci yang med// bsnan//
119a8(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba cung zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// zhes gsungs so// rnams la bshad par 'tshal bar ston// gsang dbang nor bu'i yan lag na// rdo rje yis ni mi bskyod pa//
119b1(rgyud 'grel): de skad e baM thabs shes rab// de bzhin gshegs pa gyen gshegs pa'o// bde chen sems la gsol mdzad nas// thabs shes thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud skar ma'i sbyor ba las// spyan sngar 'dug ni rtogs
119b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de ltar d+hU tI la brten nas// dga' ba bcu drug rnam dag pas// zhus pa'i tshigs bcad bcu drug dag/ zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // le'u gnyis pa slar gsungs pa// byis pa'i skye bo gdul slad du//
119b3(rgyud 'grel): ston pa la sogs mi 'ga' la// 'dir chen po'i don bshad pa// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// ces pa shAkya thub pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang che// a ra li las zas gtsang thabs// sgyu ma chen mo shes rab lo// don grub rdo rje sems//
119b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'o// mchog tu dga' ba bde ba che// bcom ldan 'das ni phyag rgya che// rdzogs pa gtsug tor thig le rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'khor drug dag ye shes// rkang gnyis mchog ni bden pa gnyis// yang na gtsug tor nor bu gnyis//
119b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba// zhes pa yi ni don bshad pa// 'jig rten kun tu khyab pa yi// ye shes skyes pas ye shes kyi// d+hU tI mthong rtags mthar thug pa// re khA nag po phra ba'i phra// longs sku 'phro ba mthong ba'o// de
119b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dang po sangs rgyas las// du ba smig rgyu srin bu me// zhes partags bcu bstan pa'o// ring zhing rnam par rtog pa las// mtshan brtags thob pas blo yangs pa// nyin mtshan rab tu brkyang mdzad de// de yang 'khor lo
119b7(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa las// gang tshe goms pa brtan gyur pa// gsal snang dngos su mthong bar 'gyur// lce rtser phyin pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji srid 'dod pa de srid du// lte 'phel bar ni 'gyur ba yis// de tshe khams gsum po yang blta// zhes
119b8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum po lus ngag yid// snang byed cing ni rtsa gsum nyid// bdud bzhi phung nyon 'chi lta bu// dgra rnams bdud sogs nyon mongs rnams// 'dul byed bde rlung thig le khams// mthul sems can
120a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi lam// 'og ltas rtswa gsum ngan song gsum// zag brgyas pas 'khor bar 'khor// des na mi 'dzag ye shes gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i lhan cig skyes// 'dzum bstan nas ni
120a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bzhi// tshangs pa dbu ma'i lam yin te// gsung ni gyen rgyu'i lam yin te// snyan pa bde rlung sil sgra 'byung // 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas// zhes pa bcu drug rtsa rgyas pas// sgo gsum lhan skyes khyab// /
120a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ lag na rdo rje bsam gtan la// stobs po che ni lhan skyes bde// rim gyis byon pas dga' bzhi rgyas// gsang dbang rdo rje nor bu la// slar gsungs pa ni mthar thug nas// slar la gnas su gshegs pa'o// snying rje
120a4(rgyud 'grel): che dang ldan gyur pas// zhes pa thams cad pa de chen b+ha ba// rang snang bzhin du bzhin snang ba'i// 'gro la rnam par rtog pa'i rlung // ban pa'i don du 'gog par byed// yA ma lngas longs spyod ldan pa khyod// ye shes lus ni rjem
120a5(rgyud 'grel): lus/ 'jam dpal thig le'i khams yin te// ming brjod dga' ba skad cig ma// don chen rtog pad bde ba che// dag par byed pa rtog spros bral// bcing grol tha mos cid de bzhin nyid// sdig sel ba ni srog gcod
120a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ rtsa ba bzhi dag gos pa med// tilbo ba yi zhal nas kyang // ri rab gser gyi logs la gang gnas pa// gang gi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang // de bzhin skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dngos po'i rang
120a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bor nas phyag rgya che// zhes gsungs so// da ni mchog mi 'gyur ye shes// nyan par brtson pa'i rnal 'byor ni// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid do// legs so nyon mongs ye shes rtogs// lag na rdo rje sbyor grub la// khyod
120a8(rgyud 'grel): legs so ni bsgom pa'o// gsang ba ta ga nor bu'i gnas// bdag po lte bar bde ba 'dzin// lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong // de phyir gsum pa'i dus su ni// nga yis khyod la rab tu bstan// khyod ni rtog med rtse//
120b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pas// yid kyi nyon la bsgom par gyis// bcom ldan b+ha ga btsun mo'i gnas// de ni skyon nub pas legs zhes// de yang te yi rdo rje las// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam
120b2(rgyud 'grel): par spras// rang gis dbang bskur snying rje che// rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer la// spyod pa byed par rtogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// gyen la gshegs pa gsol ba'o// gtsug tor chen po la sogs pa'i// 'khor lo drug rtsa'i rnam
120b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pas/ slar gsungs sh+lo drug tu dag/ slar gsungs pa'i rgya cher 'grol pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // rigs drug la gzigs le'u ni// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// ces pas bcom ldan bde ba la// shAkya
120b4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa chen po nyid// thub pa nor bu mi 'da' ba'o// gang gis gzigs na de yis gzigs// gang la gzigs na rigs drug la// ji ltar gzigs na 'khor lo drug/ sangs rgyas drug tu gzigs pa'o// gsang sngags rigs/
120b5(rgyud 'grel): chen thams cad ni// 'khor lo drug ltar khyab pa yi// 'od gsal ba ni byang chub sems// nor bu'i kha nas mi 'pho ba// me bskyod rdo rje ldan skyes dga'// baN+Di d+h+r-i ka ste 'jig pa med// gsang sngags ste rtswa yi ge'i gzugs//
120b6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'phro// 'chang ba'i rigs ni pa yin te// lte ba'i 'khor lo dzi na dzig/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// rigs gsum rdul mun snying stobs te// rnam par gzigs ni mtshan nyid med//
120b7(rgyud 'grel): dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'od dpag med pa a ro li ka/ 'jig rten lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'jig rten 'das pa snying ga nyid// rigs ni rin chen 'byung ldan la// mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rin 'byung nyid// ra ta
120b8(rgyud 'grel): nad+h+ri ka ste gsal bar byed// 'jig rten zhu ba'i khu ba la// snang byed bde chen snang ba'o// rigs chen don grub ye shes sku// haM las 'bab pa'i phrin las byed// stong pas brgyan pas pradz+nyA d+h+rika/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje
121a1(rgyud 'grel): sems/ rigs mchog rigs bsdus bde chen grol// thig le bcu drug yongs rdzogs pa// bco lnga'i mtha' can rnam par dag/ de nyid gtsug tor chen po dang // rin po che yang de nyid do//
121a2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba// de la skyon pas cher gzigs pa'o// gnas dang phung po dga' ba dang // las dang lha dang ye shes dang // dreg ldan de la gzigs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis// sh+lo ka gnyis
121a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'o// rigs drug la gzigs pa'i rgya che grel ba sna 'i 'ugasum pa'o// de nas rtswa 'phrul drab ni// mngon par byang chub le 'al// tshig gi bdag po sangs rgyas kyis// tshogs su bcad pa shwA/
121a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa yi dra ba ji snyed pa// bsdus pas 'khor lo drug tu bsdus// de nyid gsang sngags rgyal po drug/ lda na zhing badz+ra d+h+r-ika sna tshogs// 'khor lo drug la ldan pa'o// gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes pa kun rdzob don
121a5(rgyud 'grel): dam la/ kun rdzob kun brtags gzhan dbang gnyis// don dam yongs su grub pa ste// med pa bden pa dbyer med la// 'byung ba sku gsum 'byung ba'o// yang na mtha' bzhi bral ba yi// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// nang du
121a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni ro rkyang gnyis// de ni rtag chad mtha' yin pas// med pa kun 'dar ma nyid do// ma skyes rang bzhin ro gcig par// 'byung ba bde chen mchog mi 'gyur// de nyid mi skye chos can no// 'di gsungs pa ni bsam brjod med//
121a7(rgyud 'grel): a A i I u A e ai o au aM aHzhes pa 'di yi don bshad na// ma ning bzhin ma bshad pa// skye med ston pa'i rgyud yin phyir// yi ge bcu gnyis bstan pa ni// sa bcu gnyis su bstan pa yin// gnas dang
121a8(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// tshan do nye ba'i tshan do dang // 'dus nye ba'i 'dus dang // 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang // thung ngu drug ni dang po la// ring ba drug ni nye /
121b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// 'khor lo drug la 'jug pa dang // gnas la longs spyod thim pa dang // bzhi bzhis rlung 'gags mchog thob bo// 'on thob la mas de gang // zhe na a sogs bcu gnyis ni// kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od// nam mkha
121b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang rdo rje 'od// rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od// me tog 'od dang dpe med 'od// bla me de 'od dang shes rab 'od// kun mkhyen dang ni so sor rig/ dang po'i thung gsum sgo gsum dga'// dang po ring gsum mchog tu dgas
121b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa thung gsum dga' bral la// ring gsum lhan cig skyes dga'o// dga' bzhi'i rang bzhin pha rol phyin// ma skyes pa'i don bshad pa'o// de la skye ba'i rnam 'phrul ni// s+thi to hr-i di thig le la// dz+nyA na mA d+hi bde chen te/
121b4(rgyud 'grel): rahaM bud d+ho spangs rtogs ldan// bud+d+hA nAM nid+hU tI'o// t+ya d+hA wan+ti nI ni rlung gsum sgom// oM badz+ra tIHzhes pa ni// nor bu mi bskyod rlung gcod pa'o// du khaHsrid bots+tshad ni// lte ba'i nang gnas rnam snang mdzad// prad+d+he shes rab 'od dpag
121b5(rgyud 'grel): med/ dz+nyA na mA \u0f7fyi snying ge/ dz+nyAn khri ya don grub ste// dpral bar gnas pa thig la'i khams// bAg+h+nAM shwa rin chen byung // mgrin par chos kyi phreng ba gnas// a ra pa tsan+da rdor sems// gtsug tong gnas pa bcom ldan
121b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ ye tin maH phyaga'atshal// yang na a ra ba can// zhes pa'i yi ge'i don bshad na// mi 'gyur ye shes rtogs pa yis// 'dod chags la sogs sman chen bsten// mi'i chi lnga spyad dngos grub thob// gsang spyod rigs spyod
121b7(rgyud 'grel): na tu bzang // rdul 'byor rig pas smad par \u0f7f// in+ta d+ha tI'i gsung dag yin// de ltar tshigs pa cad gsum pa das// lus ga yad gsum nam dag pa'o// sngags kyi kyu che 'brel pa bu'i bzhi pa'o//
121b8(rgyud 'grel): le'u lnga pa rdo rje dbyings// dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa ni// phung khams dag pa chos kyi dbyings// 'di ltar phyag rgya chen po la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ling ga/ rtag tu rgyas bde kun tu bzang // rdzogs pa'i
122a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nor rgyas pa'o// a las 'byung ni shes rab phyin// 'od gsal phyag rgya chen mo la// gzugs brnyan snang ba mA ma kI// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ ma ning rdo rje'i bzlas pa
122a2(rgyud 'grel): yen/ rlung 'gog bzlas pa mchog sgrol ma// don chen yi ge yon tan la// dam pa thams cad ster bar byed// khong nas 'byung ba gtum mo'i me// de yang hi yi rdo rje las// lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs//
122a3(rgyud 'grel): pabalnga bsregs te// spyan sogs yang ni bsregs byas nas// haM las ri bong can 'dzag go/ zhes gsungs so// srog chen rdzogs byed gos dkar mo// tshig tu brjod pa nyams pa'i mtha'// spangs pa bde chen brtan spyan ma//
122a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ bde stong dbyer med ye shes so// tshig kun rtswa rlung yi ge'i gzugs// gtum mos klags pas bde stong gsal// de nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// nyams su myong ba mchod pa ste// phyi rol rdzas
122a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rgya chen phul// dam pa gsum gyis bsngo byas nas// 'di phyi'i yon tan rjes 'brangs pas// thar pa'i rgyur gyur shin tu dka'// thar pa'i rtsa smos khams gong ma'i// rgur gyur pa yang ting 'dzin na// de byed rnam
122a6(rgyud 'grel): par g.yengs phyir ro// des na mchod chen ma yin no// bdud rtsi bsten sogs 'dod yon spyod// de yang brgyud pa'i rgyu min pas// mchod chen ma yin mchod chen ni// dug lnga'i de nyid rtogs pa de'i// gsum pa'i ye shes
122a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu yin// chen po'i shes rab ye shes so// 'dod chags gsum dus ye shes che// sems can las can skal bzangs la// sgog sum dpag med dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po gong bzhin la// zhe sdang che ni rlung
122a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa'o// des ni bde g.yos rtog med pas// spang bya nyon mongs kun gyi sgra// che ba 'di las mi bskyod pa'o// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// srog rtso la d+hU tI'i lam zhugs pas// gti mug blo ni shes rab la// gti mug
122b1(rgyud 'grel): sel ba snang mdzad pa'o// mchod pa chen po gong dang mtshungs// khro ba chen po nyams pa 'joms// yang na dga' bral ye shes la// khro ba chen po lhan cig skyes// drag po chen po don grub po// mchod pa chen po 'dod pa che// bde bas//
122b2(rgyud 'grel): sems bsdus mi rtog rgyas// de yis 'dod pa thams cad nyid// sel bar byed phyir rin po che// chags pa nyid na chags pa med// 'dod sogs lnga po dbyer med pa// drug pa rdor 'chang dus 'khor lo// 'dod pa chen po
122b3(rgyud 'grel): lus bdag// bde bachen po dag bdeb// dga' ba chen po sems bdeb// mgub cheni ye shes pade// de yang malog gnyid song dang // rme la mar+g+haM la mtshan po dang // nga nyid sbrul longs ches pade chen// dga' ba dga'
122b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhir nyams su myong // gzugs che thig les ling ga rgyas// lus kyang 'od gsal che ba ste// longs spyod rdzogs sku yul rgyas pa'o// de ni lus kyi dga' ba mchog/ kha dog che zhing yon tan rgyas// lus bong che ba d+hU tI rgyas//
122b5(rgyud 'grel): deni ngag gi mchog dga'o// ming yang che zhing mchog gsang theg/ rgya che des khyab bde sems dga'// dkyil ni bde ba snying po la// 'khor ni rtsa thig rlung gis bskor// chen po'i chos nyid yangs pa yin// sgyu ma lte bur sha
122b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de ni ye shes mchog dga'o// de ni longs sku'i mchog dga'o// shes rab mtshon chen stong pa nyid// 'chang ba dngos rnams 'joms pa ste// nyon mongs chen po las rgya yi// pad+ma la brten skyes pa yi// bdi myong lus kyi
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' bral dga'// lcags kyu'i mchog ni ye shes kyi// 'dod pas 'khrig chags bzhi bde ba// de ni ngag gi dga' bral dga'// grags chen ma rlung sgra yin la// snyan grags gsal snang ye shes te// sems kyi dga' bral
122b8(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'o// snang ba chen po rdo rje thabs// gsal ba chen po shes rab yum// gnyis med sbyor bas bde rgyas pa// ye shes dga' bral dga' ba'o// mkhas pa bde stong thabs la mkhas// sgyu 'phrul snang stong chen po
123a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang / de ni lus kyi lhan skyes dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po phyag rgya bzhi// grub pa med pas don grub pa'o// ngag gi lhan cig skyes dga' ba'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po b+ha ga la// dga' bas
123a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ni bde myong ba'o// de ni sems kyi lhan skyes dga'o// sgyu 'phrul chen po rtsi 'khor lo// mig 'phrul can ni zhen pa'o// de ni ye shes lhan skyes dga'// gtsug tor rdo rje nor bu'i bar// dga' gsum dga' ba bcu
123a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis las// mas yang dga' ba dga' bzhi ste// gnyis mnyam gnyis gnas dbus dag na// bde dang mi rtog mtshan dang bral// lhan cig skyes pa'i yul can la// dga' bral rtog zhes brjod do gsung // dga' ba rnam pa
123a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug go// rgyas par bshad pa dri med ltos// sbyin bdag chen po byi nang stong // gtso bo sgeg mos lhan skyes skyer// 'jig rten sbyin las khyad par 'phags// tshul khrims chen po byang chub sems// 'chang ba mi
123a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams nor bya yis// rtse mor phreng ba mnyams mchog/ bzod chen bde bas sems bsdus blas// 'tshang ba mi 'phro brtan pa'o// brtson 'grus chen po g.yas grwa yon drung // d+hU tIr brtul ba 'bar g.yo gar// bsam
123a6(rgyud 'grel): gtan chen po bde stong la// ting 'dzin me tog rtse gcig blta// shes rab chen po stong po nyid// lus ni ma rig mun pa'i dngos// 'chang ba gnyen po'i mar me 'dzin// stobs po che ni rlung grub pa// mkha' la 'gro
123a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdug spos can// thabs che ba ni bde 'phel bas// lus rnams kun la khyab par byug/ smon lamakhu ba mnyam za bas// chos rnams dpe brgyad sa spyod ma// ye shes me rlung rgya mtshon// 'bin du dung khang gnas pa
123a8(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mkha' spyod rnam par dag pa'o// khyams chen shes bya bde bar shar// rang bzhin spros bral dpag med rtogs// snying rje chen po chags bcas la// bruM yaM mchog ni bde steng myong // shes rab chen po gang du yang //
123b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs su med pa phyag rgya che// blo chen ldan ni dga' bzhi'o// mkhas pa chen po zhes pa ni// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las// sems dpa' reg pa chags brgyas// shin tu chags chen 'dar ba dang // g.yo dang 'khrug
123b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yid 'khrug dang // myos dang rgyal ba bcu ru 'dod// de nyid nang du sbyar ba yis// so sor bsdu ba'i mtshan ma bcu// thabs chen yul ni nyi shu bzhir// bde bas khyab pa dpa' bo'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan//
123b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa rlung rnams 'chun pa'o// shugs chen byang sems mi nyams pa// mgyogs pa chen po rtsa kun khyab// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// bde bas bdag gzhan bskul nus
123b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// stobs chen mtshams med lnga sogs las// pha rol gnon pa des me gos// de yang rdo rje theg pa las// gdol pa smig ma mkhan la sogs// mtshams med lnga sogs byed pa'i mis// gsod pa don du gnyer
123b5(rgyud 'grel): bas kyang // tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes pa'o// srid pa'i ri bo 'jig tshogs kyi// lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis so// chen po gzhig par dka' ba'o// 'joms ni bde chen spros bral lo// bde chen thob rtags gang zhe na//
123b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhregs shing nor bu'i rtsa gnas la// rdo rje chen po ling ga rgyas// 'chang ba rdo rje 'jigs byed do// de nyid drag po chen po ste// drag shul chen po dug gsum 'joms// 'jigs chen rtag pa 'jigs par byed// 'jigs
123b7(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa chad pa 'joms// mgon po rigs mchog phyag rgya che// chen po de la lhag med pa'o// bla ma bde ba chen po la// gsang sngags bde ba'i dam tshig bsrung // che ba'i mchog ni thabs mchog go// theg pa chen po'i tshul
123b8(rgyud 'grel): la gnas/ ces pa thabs 'dis 'jig rten 'di// 'dir 'degs pas na tshul la gnas// des na theg pa chen po yi// tshul ni he ru bdag med na// mchog ni rdo rje pad+mar sbyor// gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying // lte ba gsang
124a1(rgyud 'grel): ba nor bu rtse// 'gro dang byon pa bcu bzhi yis// tshigs bcad bcu bzhi rnam par dag/ rdo rje'i lus nyid rdo rje dbyings// gnas bdun byon gshegs bde myong ba// lha'o des na dkyil 'khor te/
124a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad brgya bcu gnyis bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// / le'u drug pa chos kyi dbyings// rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni// sangs rgyas bde chen gsol bar mdzad//
124a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad 'od gsal che// thub pa chen po mi nyams bde// thub chen ldan pa sgo gsum rgyas// gsang sngags tshul chen bde stong la// de las byung ba 'dod yon lam// gsang sngags tshul chen dbang bzhi la// rig pa
124a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// ces pa bum dbang rdzas bcu ste// gsum pardzas gsum ster sbyin pa// gnyis sbyor byang sems brtan 'dzin pa// tshul khrims rtog bral bzod pa'o// brtson 'grus pa/
124a5(rgyud 'grel): thag tsam mi 'jig/ bde stong mi g.yo bsam gtan no// shes rab lha mo'i phyag rgya las// bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa'o// thabs ni gong gi ma rtogs na// ka ra na bcu la brten nas// 'gog dang bzlog dang khyab sogs thabs// de yang sdom
124a6(rgyud 'grel): brgya mtsho las// kun du num pa kuN+Da li// na khas rtse dang dan das rtse// yang dag sbyor dang sid ces smra// nyid cing skyes pa ltar byed pa// brgyad la brgyad brgya dbye ba yis// byed pa drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur// zhes gsungs so//
124a7(rgyud 'grel): smon lam bde chen mi 'bral ba// stobs ni zlog dka' zlog pa'o// ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'o// phyen bcu thob pas dbang rdzogs pa'o// de yang kam+ba'i zhal snga nas// dur khrod chen po'i dgon par rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/
124a8(rgyud 'grel): gser snod dag tu seng ge'i zho lkugs chen phan tshun du// dbul ba sel dang bsil ba thob pas dang po dang po gnyis// rjes chags khro med le lo med pas gnyis pas gsum dang bzhi// rtse gcig rtog bral gsum pas lnga
124b1(rgyud 'grel): pa drug pa de bzhin gzhan// 'gog len khyab byed gnas pa 'khrul 'khor rlung thabs stobs// gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bcu gnyis smon 'debs de bzhin nyid// bde dang cig shos dbyer med gnas pa bzhi ni bzhi pa
124b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis bdag la 'di 'dra gsal bar snang zhes gsungs so// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// zhes pa khams bcu 'joms pa ste// rlung dang sems dang byang chub sems// khrag dang rkang dang dus pa dang //
124b3(rgyud 'grel): rus pa sha dang dbang po dang // pags pa la sogs bcu po de// bde bas khyab brtan gnas pa'o// de nyid gnas dang dag par 'dod// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// zhes pa yul dang yul can dag/ pha rol phyin pa bcu yi
124b4(rgyud 'grel): chulnga/ nyes bkar na bcu yis// bde stong skyes pa tshul chen no// mgon po bde chen he ru ka/ sa bcu gnas dang nye gnas sogs// dbang phyug mi 'jig dga' ye shes// sa bcu la ni gnas pa'o// zhes pa ka ra na brtul//
124b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs re res brgyan pa'o// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// zhes pa lta stangs shes pa las// rnam dag thob rtags rnam pa bcu// du ba smig rgyu srin bu me// 'bar ba zla sngon mkha' dag dang // thig le re khA nag
124b6(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ bdag nyid can ni sna tshogs pa'o// longs sku mthong ba yin par 'dod// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba'o// zhes pa bug med nam mkha' dag/ bltas te dbang po yul yul can// gcig tu gyur pa mthong ba ni// sbyor ba yan
124b7(rgyud 'grel): lag drug yin te// rtags rtogs ldan pa 'chang ba yin// dpal ldan dang po sangs rgyas las// nam mkhar sems gtad mig mi 'dzum// rdo rje lam zhugs rtags bcu mthong // zhes so// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don//
124b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa rnam bcu gong rtags la// shal sogs pa spyan lnga yis// yul dang yul can mthong ba'o// thub dbang stobs bcu zhes pa ni// gyen thur med khyab srog dang ni// klu dang rus rtsangs nor lho sbyin// khyab pa'i bdag
125a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid bde stong ngo // kun gyi nyi khri chig stong la// don ni 'gog cing ma lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba bo// me dang zla ba nyi ma dang // thig le nag po thig le che// sangs rgyas longs sku mthong ba'o//
125a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang dang po sangs rgyas las// tshe las yo byad skye dang chos// rdzu 'phrul mos smon sems ye shes// rtags bcu'i grub pa dbang bcu'o// zhes gsungs so// thog ma med pas dga' ba la// spros med bdag ni mchog/
125a3(rgyud 'grel): dgra'o// de bzhin nyid ni lhan cig skyes// dag pa'i bdag ni dga' bral lo// bden par rang bzhin myong bzhin pa// smra zhing rigs ldan bu la ni// tshig mi 'gyur ni don dang rtags// bde ba che la sbyor ba'o// shes rab bu ni bla ma
125a4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// ces pa 'dzag pa spong ba'o// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// ces pa 'di yi don bshad na// dang po rtog pa skum pa ste// de nas rtog med skye ba yin// zer ba mi 'thad rgyu 'dra
125a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ 'bras bu 'dra ba byung phyir ro// sA lu las ni khri min no// des na rtog med rgyu las ni// 'bras bu rtog med ye shes skye// yang dag ye shes mtha' nor bu// de la rnam par gnas po ni// mi 'dzag ye shes dga' ba'i
125a6(rgyud 'grel): sems// bdag med chos rnams brjod de med// seng ge rims gnon sgra ldan pas// mu stegs de nyid mi shes pa// stong sgros ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba bde chen po// don yod stobs ni sbyor bas brtson//
125a7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bab pa de bzhin du// dung khang gnas su slar gshegs pa'i// bde chen khyab pa yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba 'dod chags las rgyal dga'// rnam rgyal rlung rgyal dga' ye shes// dgra las rgyal po ma rig sogs//
125a8(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel las rgyal lhan skyes so// 'khor lo drug la sgyur ba ni// rtsal thig le brgyan pa'o// stobs po che ni dpung bzhi ste// snang ba thob dang snang ba mched// brtan dang de kho na zhus bzhi'o// tshogs kyi stong phrag
125b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun cu gnyis// slob dpon shu kra ye shes so// tshogs kyi dga' gsum mchog ldan skyes// tshogs ni skad cig gsum yin te// rje ni mtshan med skad cig ma// tshogs ni phyag rgya gsum yin te// bdag po phyag rgya chen
125b2(rgyud 'grel): po'o// chos can bcwo brgyad de dag la// dbang dang ldan pas dbang ldan no// mthu chen bde chen gces pa la// rtag tu nyams med 'dzin pa ste// de nyid tshul chen rtag bcu thob// gzhan dring mi 'jog bcos ma med// tshig rje
125b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag gis mchog sbyin nus// tshig ni so sor yang dge rig/ tshig bdag smra mkhas ces pa ni// grub chen brgyad sogs phrin las rnams// tshig gis nus pas nges tshig rig/ tshig la dbang ba don rig pa'o// tshig mtha'
125b4(rgyud 'grel): yas pa shes rab rgyas// spobs pa so sor rig pa'o// tshig bden kun rdzob lha dkyil 'khor// bden par smra ba don dam ste// rdzogs rim rnam pa bzhi yin no// de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las// thams cad bden pa gnyis
125b5(rgyud 'grel): lani/ brten parangs ni rtag bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub phyir// sgom par mngon du gyur pa yin// rgyud rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor pa// bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten// zhes gsungs so// bden pa bzhi ni sdug
125b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal sogs// ston pa po ni dga' bzhir ston// phyir mi ldog pa rlung grub pas// phyir mi 'ong ba thig le brtan// 'dren pa rang gis rig gi rlung // hUM has bde rlung 'dren pa'o// rang rgyal de yis khams rgyas pa// bse ru aM ba
125b7(rgyud 'grel): d+hU tI yin// tshul ni mya ngan 'das pa'o// nges 'byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// sna tshogs theg pa sna tshogs lam// las byung ji ltar de ltar snang // 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// zhes pa 'byung ba lnga yin la// chen po de las
125b8(rgyud 'grel): chos kun skyes// rgyu ni rgyu dang rkyen nyid do// gcig po chos dang chos can gyi// rgyu rkyen gyur pa 'di nyid yin// chos ni 'byung la chos can ni// rnam par shes pa de la drug/ shes pa skye ba'ang chos yin te// shes pa nyid na ci zhig/
126a1(rgyud 'grel): shes/ shes med sems ni 'od gsal ba// dond ma des na mya ngan 'das// 'du shes med 'gog snyoms 'jug yin// theg pa chen po'i bsgrub bya ni// srid pa gsum la dmigs nas ni//
126a2(rgyud 'grel): mig 'phrul lta bu'i rnam pa yis// lam la thub pa'i yon tan len// kun rdzob 'khor dang myang 'das gnyis// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'o// de nyid don du bden 'dod pa// nyan thos phyi rol pa yi lugs// shes pa snang ba yin//
126a3(rgyud 'grel): no zhes/ gsal ba dam pa'i don 'dod pa// cig shos rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyad par cung zad yod min pas// kun rdzob mig 'phrul lta bur snang // don dam rang bzhin med pa nyid// gnyis
126a4(rgyud 'grel): med phyag rgya chen por 'dod// rdo rje gsum gyi byed pa la// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur chos rnams gnas// sku rdo rje la srabs// gsher ba chu ste dro ba me// bskyod pa rlung ste go 'byed mkha'// gsung rdo rje yi rnam pa ni// a li shes rab
126a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes khams// kA li thabs las khams lnga 'byung // ka tsa Ta ta pa lnga sa// khatshaSha tha pha lnga chu// gaMdz+ra Da d+ha ba lA me// g+hadz+nyA r+d+ha d+ha b+ha lba rlung // dA ny-i Nan ma lnga mkha'// ka tsaT ta pany+dza ye shes// mgrin kan spyi bo mchu so
126a6(rgyud 'grel): pu pi wa o lnga ni// mchu sgra chu yi khams yin no// l-i tu la sa a lpa ni// so sgra sa yi khams yin no// 'byung gnas lnga las byung ba yi// 'byung ba'i nus pa'i me tog ni// kha dog yi gi dug lngar smin// yi ge/
126a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i sgra rtag pa// dbyangs sgra dbyangs la gsal byed dgra// gsal byed rang nyid yin par 'dod// gsal dbyangs thabs shes gnod pa med// dbyangs yig dgra gyur 'chi ba ste// gsal byed dgrar
126b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur nad kyis thebs// yan lag dgrar gyur dpal 'phrog byed// dbang thang mi mthun rnyed pa med// de rnams mthun par gyur pas na// tshe ring nad med dpal 'byor ldan// phal pas btang snyoms 'bras gsal min//
126b2(rgyud 'grel): chu dgra rlung la rlung dgras// sa dgra mel me dag chu// nam mkha' kun grogs mthun pa'o// sa bshes chu la chu ba shes sa// me bshes rlung la rlung bshes me// rlung bran tshul me bran sa// chu bran me la sa bran rlung //
126b3(rgyud 'grel): na gas // pa / ga sa ba da/ na / na nga byung // ny-i gyur
126b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi/ bye brag la sa ni bzhir shes bya// srog mthun tshe ring lus mthun pas// nad med dpal mthun dpal dang ldan// dbang thang mthun pas longs spyod 'phel// mi mthun tshe thung na dmang zhing // sems med
126b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal med longs spyod 'grib// phal pas phan dang gnod pa med// bran gyis gcig gnod gcig la pan// mkhas gnyis dbyings dang ye shes bzang // gsum ni dbyer med mchog yin te// bzhi pas bshig par
126b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin// rlung gnyis srog rtsol ngan pa ste// gsum gyi ye shes bzang por 'gyur// me gnyis phal pa yun thung 'thab// gsum ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'khrug/ chu gnyis bzang po gsum yang btug// bzhi pa
126b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gong dang mtshungs// sa gnyis bzang po gsum po btub// bzhi pa bzang po lnga pa spang // phan tshun phan gnod stobs las shes// stobs mnyam dpal dang dbang thang srog/ gsum gyis stobs las phan
126b8(rgyud 'grel): tshun shes/ de mnyam kun du 'gran par byos// phan 'dogs de yi grogs kyis bya// gnod byed de yi dgra yis bya// tshe dang nan dang dpal dang grog/ srog lus dpal dang dbang thar la// de dang de yi gnyen pos byed//
127a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ni ser po sa gru bzhi// chu ni dkar po chu zlum po// me ni dmar po me gru gsum// rlung ni sngon po rlung zla gam// nam mkha' kun grogs mdog dbyibs bral// de nyid gcig tu phan gnod
127a2(rgyud 'grel): dka'/ 'byung ba re la las drug ste// bsnun dang dbab dang bsreg pa dang // tshim dang gso dang dgyes pa'o// re re'ang thig les brgyan par bya// sgron ma'i ming la mtshon byas na// oM b+haHphaT ni bsnun pa'o// oM AHhUM ne
127a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs po'o// aur+N+NaHbo Sha Ta sreg pa'o// oMlpAHna mtshim pa'o// oM lpAHswA hA gso ba'o// au staM pa Sha Ta dgyes pa'o// 'byung ba dar dang rgud dang mnyam// gsos btab shes smad gnyis gnyis nas// re re la yang
127a4(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// 'byung chung nyi shu rtsa lngal// dbyibs mdog las kyang nyi shu lnga// dus phyogs nyon mongs nyi shu lnga// spong thob 'dod pas shes par bya// sham+b+ha la dang sing ga gling // na la 'dzam bu gling sogs dpag med
127a5(rgyud 'grel): na/ yi ge grangs dang gogs dang // ming mi 'dra ba gang yod kyang // 'byung gnas lnga las byung shes pas// de yis sgra rnams thams cad shes// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi// sngags kyi de nyid mi shes par// gang zhig lha grub
127a6(rgyud 'grel): las byed pa// nam mkha' bza' bar 'dod dang mtshungs// de phyir sngags pa rnams la ni// phan 'dod dri med 'od kyi don// cung zad bdag gis 'dir ni blangs// de yang dgyes pa rdo rje las// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa
127a7(rgyud 'grel): sra ba sa yi khams// gsher ba chu ste dro ba me// bskyod pa rlung khams bde nam mkha'// lnga yis yongs su bskor ba yin// dge slong nyon mongs med pa'o// dgra bcom 'dod chags bde 'gyur ba// zag pa dri chu lu zad
127a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// 'dod chags 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bral bas dbang gsum ye shes la// dbang po thul ba bzhi pa'i dus// bde ba rnyed pas mi 'dzag pa'o// 'jigs med thob ni 'khor ba med// bsil bar gyur pa chags pa
127b1(rgyud 'grel): zad / rnyog pa med ni dngas ma'o// de yang 'khor lo sdom pa las// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rnam par spangs// gdul bya de rnams shes nas kyang // yi ge las byung rnam par spangs// tshangs pa nyid du gyur nas phyis// nam mkha'
127b2(rgyud 'grel): lta bur 'gyur ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rig pa dang ni gsum skyes sde// rkang par shes rab ye shes la// ldan pa bzhi pa'i ye shes so// bde gshegs theg le 'jig rten rig/ nyon mongs byang lam rtogs pa'i
127b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ bdag gir me 'dzin dga' ba ste// las rgya yin no ngar mi 'dzin// mchog dga' yi ni chos rgya'o// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// zhes bltan skyes dam rgyal// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa// dga'
127b4(rgyud 'grel): bral dga' ba phyag rgya che// bya ba byas pas skam sar gnas// rim gyis bzhi par gnas pa'o// shes pa 'ba' zhig chos rnams te// des gsal lhan skyes ye shes rtogs// shes rab mtshon cha stong nyid kyis// nyon mongs te
127b5(rgyud 'grel): konyon rnam 'joms pa'o// dam pa tha ma rdorje 'chang // chos kyi brgyad khri bzhi stong la// chos rgyal e baM chos kun dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi pha ma'o// gsol bar ka li ldan pa a// de las chos rnams thams cad skyes// de
127b6(rgyud 'grel): yang mkhab 'gro rgya mtsho las// A li kA li ma rtogs par// gal te rdo rje'i chos 'dod pa// 'dis ni 'bras bu ma yin te// thub ma rdung bar byed dang mtshungs// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten ma rtogs log rtogs
127b7(rgyud 'grel): sa/ snang bar zhed pa'i de nyid mthang // mchog ni lhan skyes ye shes so// chos kyi dbang phyug taM las ni// rang byin rlob pa chos kyi rgya laM// legs pa'i lam ni chags bcas pa// spyod lam mi spyod ston pa'o// don grub
127b8(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu mi 'gyur thob// bsam pa grub pa ste zhes pa// las rgya sdug bsngal snod yin pas// spangs te ye shes phyag rgya las// rdo rje sems dpa' mngon byed pa'o// kun du rtog pa mi mo la// brtan pa'i bde ba
128a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog yan lag drug/ pham mo bdag med ma brten te// dbyings mi zad pa'i ye shes thob// 'di na rdo rje 'char chen po// de yang gsungs pa// rnam
128a2(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa gang gang gis// dngos po gang la gang rtog pa// de nyid kun du brtags pa ya// ngo bo nyid med de med do// zhes gsungs so// 'o na spang bya kho na'am// zhe na chos dbyings dam pa la// zad mi shes pa'i thabs
128a3(rgyud 'grel): yod pas/ blo ngan rnams la bstan pa yin// de yang klu las khros pa las// zhi bas pham par ma gyur na// de bzhin gshegs nyid khro bor sprul// ji ltar ji ltar btul gyur pa// 'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems// zhes
128a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// bsod nams snying rje chen po la// ldan pa chags pa'i glan pa'o// bsod nams mi 'dzag bde ba'i sems// tshogs ni phyag rgya chen po'i thabs// de yang / lus la ye shes chen po gnas// 'di rtogs
128a5(rgyud 'grel): grol bar kun 'dod la// de rtogs thabs ni bsod ye shes// yin par kun mthun thabs me mkhas// bsod nams phyir sogs ye shes ni// blo yis byas pas thar pa ring // 'dir ni bsod nams dkyil 'khor che//
128a6(rgyud 'grel): bcud rnams kyis mchod gnyis 'phel bas// bde stong rgyas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'di 'dra bsod nams gang la srid// ye shes tshogs kyang de nyid do// des na rgyud rnams kun las kyang // dka' thub dka'
128a7(rgyud 'grel): smad 'dir mi dgos// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// ci bde bar ni spyad pas 'grub// ces gsungs so// ye shes nor bu dmigs med bde// ye shes haM skyes thig le'i khams// 'byung gnas tshe ni de nyid do//
128a8(rgyud 'grel): de yang rgyud las 'di skad gsungs// rlung bcings pa yi sbyor ba yis// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsregs// rtog med ye shes la sbyor ba// lus kyi thabs la brten pa mchog/ ces gsungs so// rang
128b1(rgyud 'grel): la ye shes ldan pa yis// yod mi shes pa 'di yin te// pha rol ye shes yod med shes// yang na mtha' bral rtogs pa'o// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o// zhes pa ba spu'i bu ga nas// sprul pa sprul te 'gro don
128b2(rgyud 'grel): nus/ 'di 'dra'i bde stong snying rje'i sems// med par dka' thub zas spong sogs// rgya mtsho rus sbal khog gsho 'dra// rtag pa mi nyams kun rgyal ba// rtsa stong phrag ni bdun na gnyis// bde chen rang bzhin rgyas pa ste// rnal
128b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor can ni sgo gsum dag/ de yang lus las gsungs pa ni// ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni de bshad do// zhes so// bsam gtan dga' bzhi bsam byin// rlung dang rtsa rnams dran pa'o// yang na steng
128b4(rgyud 'grel): gar pad+ma'i gnas// cha med dran pa blo ldan mchog/ so sor rang rig mi g.yo ba// zhes pa gzhon nus ha dzA// rig la smra bar ma nus pa'o// mchog gi dang po lhan cig skyes// sgra gsum 'chang ba rdo rje sems// sangs rgyas sku
128b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dag dang ldan pa'o// de yang he yi rdo rje las// bo la kak+kol sbyor nas// shes pa 'di ru sbyor ba yin// sangs rgyas lnga bdag rigs lnga la// cod pan lnga phung dag rtags su// sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ba'o// spyan lnga
128b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i rtags lnga la// bltas pas chags pa med pa 'chang // de yang dra ba sdom pa las// dang po ri dgas sred du snang ba ste// mtshan ma gnyis pa dud kha'i rnam pa can// gsum pa me khyer dang 'dra bzhi pa ni// sprin/
128b7(rgyud 'grel): med nam mkha' mtshan ma lnga pa ni// shin tu 'od gsal rang gi snang ba 'char// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa'o// zhes pa sprul longs sogs mthong la// nyin mo'i rtags mthong
129a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes drug/ sangs rgyas sras po byang chub sems// dam pa'i mchog ni de bskyed pa'o// shes pa srid 'byung dkyil 'khor la// skye gnas med ni rdzogs pa'i rim// de yang
129a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa// skyed pa'i rim la rab gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom byed pa// sangs rgyas thabs dang ldan pa yis// skas kyi sen mo bzhin du bshad// ces gsungs so// chos las 'byung ba b+ha ga la// baM gzhag/
129a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi srid pa srel// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ ces pas lhan skyes ye shes so// dngos de skyes ma thag tu ni// kun gyi don grub 'gro ba'i bdag/ smin cing 'khrul 'khor ldan pa yis// nam mkha' las byung rang
129a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba/ rtags brgyad mthong ba 'di lta ste// shes rab ye shes me bo che// rang sems 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// zla ba'i ye shes rnam snang mdzad// ye shes
129a5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba la ma me ba// nyi ma'i ye shes rin chen 'byung // 'gro ba'i ye shes mar me sgron// rA hu ye shes don yod grub// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// glog gi ye shes mtha' yas nyid// sngags drag mnga' bdag rig
129a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal// thig le gnas pa'i ye shes te// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid do// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// zla sngon snang ba'i ye shes ni// he ru ka dpal nyid du 'dod// tsug tor chen po'i lta stangs
129a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ re khA nag po ye shes mthong // dus kyi 'khor lo thod pa can// smad byung gtsug ni rdo rje 'chang // thams cad mthong ba mechog thob pa'o// nam mkha'i bdag po ta ran// sna tshogs ston pa yon tan no// de yang
129a8(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i sangs rgyas las// ta ran bcings yon tan gyis// srid pa gsum po ma g.yos pas// nam mkha'i bdag por de gyur te// rtags bcu la sogs sna tshogs ston// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas
129b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bdag po ni// nags rnams snang bas dngos po mchog/ de 'dra mthong ba'i rnal 'byor te// kun dga' chen po'i mig dang ldan// ldan chos lta stangs bzhi yin te// sna tshogs gzugs can rtags mtshan rnams//
129b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa po ni yan lag drug/ mchod cing brjod pa bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// drang srong chen po bcom ldan 'das// rigs gsum gnas dang zhing ye shes// 'chang ba de la bde ba yod// gsang sngags 'chang ni rnal 'byor
129b3(rgyud 'grel): paM/ thig le mi nyams gsang sngags 'dzin// dam tshig chen po rtag tu bde// gtso bo rtsa gsum dkon mchog gsum// 'dzin pa de nang thig le 'dzin// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// zhes pa ldan skyes ye
129b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rten// kal pa dang ni logs gdugs so// don yod theg la zhags pa nI// d+hA gi 'bigs pas rnam par rgyul// 'dzin pa 'khor lo drug tu ni// rlung 'gag chen po rdo rje zhags// rlung gis de blangs rdo rje lo// ljags
129b5(rgyud 'grel): klu zhags pa che zhes bya// yang na zhags pa che zhes pa// lte ba'i 'og rtsa 'khyil ba ni// nor rgyas ming can rlung de yis// d+hU tI nas 'phags byang sems 'gugs// de la zhags pa zhes brjod do// lus ni yul chen
129b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu bzhi// dpral ba la sogs sbyar ba dang // snying dbus pad+ma'i 'dab mar ldan// gnas gtso yin te rtsa ldi yis// tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga dag/ rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel
129b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // le'u bdun pa rdo rje'i rigs// tshigs su bcad pa bcu dang gcig/ dang po rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// rdo rje a bi d+hU tI la// de nang rlung ni 'jigs byed do// 'jig par byed ni de rtogs gshig/
129b8(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i rgyal po dga' bral mtha'// so sor sdud sogs gdong drug la// 'jigs pa des ni rtog pa gcod// mig drug mngon shes la ga drug rtags// stobs dang ldan ni 'dod chags kyis// chags pa thams
130a1(rgyud 'grel): cad 'joms pa'o// keng rus spyi bo'i haM dkar po// mche ba a shad gtsigs pa'o// bla ma'i gdams pas gtum mo sbor// ha la ha la mkha' ye shes// gdong brgya rtsa rlung spong
130a2(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ ye shes mi 'dra gdong brgya'o// gshin rje gnyis med ye shes te// gshed po de yis gnyis snang 'joms// bgegs kyi rgyal ni bdud bzhi rgya la// rdo rje yang dag ye shes la// shugs can zhes pas 'jigs par
130a3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ rdo rje drag po lus ngag yid// gsang ba 'dus sogs las gsungs so// rdo rje snying po chos kyi tshul// sgyu 'phrul mA yA e dang bi// rdo rje ling ga gsus po che// rgyas shing shin tu rgyas pa'o// rdo rje las skyes rdor
130a4(rgyud 'grel): bum nang // dz+wa lan d+ha ra dbu rgyan par// bde bas gang la rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje snying pos sku gsung thugs// mkha'i dragasang gnas las skyes bde// mi g.yo srog rtsol gnas pa la// ral pa gcig pa ro gcig grol//
130a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyings pa de 'dra gang yod pa'o// glang chen bde ba ko rlon ni// lus kun khyab cing mnyam par byas// de ldan pas na gos su gyon// grags chen bde bas gang ba la// hA ha zhes sgrogs dpa' bo'i gad// hi hi zhes
130a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs dpa' mo'i gad// 'jigs par byed pa sngon bde myong // gad mo chen po bde chen thig/ ga rgyangs can ni ltung ba'i sgra// ha brgyad brjod pa rdo rje'i gad// cher sgrogs pa ni rgyun chad med// rdo rje sems dpa' byang
130a7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems// sems dpa' chen po dbyer med bde// rdo rje b+ho la rgyal po ni// de yi nang gnas bde ba che// rdo rje drag po stong pa nyid// rtag tu de ldan dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs// zhes pa hUM bzhis
130a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas bzhir ni// dga' bzhi nyams su myong ba'o// rdo rje a bad+hU tI la// mda' thogs pa na mtshon cha can// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi rlung 'gags pa// mtshon chen de yis rnam rtog gcod// rdo rje gnyis
130b1(rgyud 'grel): me ye shes kyis// ram gyi nyon mongs ma lus gcod// do rlung rnams kun 'chang ba// yi rtse mor yungs 'brub sgo pa// de nyir nor ba da r+dz+nyA na// de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las// sA rtser yungs klu shes brjod pa// de yang
130b2(rgyud 'grel): srog dang rtsol bar brjod// khams gsum pa ni ma lus la// srid gsum gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gcig pu las rgyal// de brten bde bas g.yul sel ba'o// rdo rje 'bar btsa
130b3(rgyud 'grel): Da li/ mig mi zad ni ri dgas mig/ spyi bor rdo rje 'bar ba ste// zhes pa yang rtse mar rtse 'bar// rdo rje 'bebs pa bcu drag la// de yang phyed byed 'bebs pa che// khams gsum phyag rgya chen por dbang // mig brgya
130b4(rgyud 'grel): pas te mngal bya// rdo rje mig ni sha yi sprin// de yi gzugs brnyan mthong ba'o// lus ni rdo rje ba spu can// ces pa bA s+phu bye phyed bzhi// nang du thig le'i kha 'bru'o// de nyid rdo rje'i spu yin te// gcig pu lus
130b5(rgyud 'grel): nirgyun chad med// sen mo dkar dmar 'dris pa las// pri sra ba bde stong rdo rje'i rtse// mi 'dzag rtag tu dga' ba'i yid// rdo rje snying po rnam rtag med// pags pa mkhregs ni sgron mi tshugs// rdo rje phreng 'dzin
130b6(rgyud 'grel): yul rtsa bzhir// thim dang longs spyod 'jug pa gsum// nyin mtshan dus 'das dpal dang ldan// de 'dra'i byed gsum rdo rje rgyu ni// rnal 'byor lus la brgyan pa ste// kun la bde ba'i gad rgyangs ni// dga' chen
130b7(rgyud 'grel): haha nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa 'khor lo drug/ rdo rje'i sgra ni Ak+Sha ra// 'gyur ba med pa'i yi ge'o// 'jam dbyangs thig le chen po la// de ni mi 'pho sgra che ba// 'jig rten gsu ba na sgra gcig pa/
130b8(rgyud 'grel): ces pa zag pa dgra gcig pu// de 'dul thabs chen stong gsum gyi// nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa'o// sgra dang ldan pa theg chen tshes// sna tshogs thabs lam bstan pa las// rnams kyi
131a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur 'di nyid do// snying ga'i phyi yi rtsa bdun dang // 'og gi rtsa bzhi dri chen dang // dri chu khrag dang khu ba 'bab// bcu gcig dag pa sh+lo ka/ bcu dang tshig rkang gcig dgu pa'o// rdo rje
131a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // le'u brgyad pa 'od dpag med// pad+ma'i rigs kyi le'u la// tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bstan/ de bzhin
131a3(rgyud 'grel): ljid ni d+hU hUM'o// yang dag bdag med g.yas g.yon rlung // yang dag mtha' sgra rlung grub pa// yi ge med ni rnam tog med// stong nyid mi 'jig gang pa'i sems// swA ba A le kA li la// lha mchog bdud rnams 'dzegs pa
131a4(rgyud 'grel): zab cing stong nyid rgya rkyen snang // dbyer med dbyer mang sna sgrogs pa// rjes kyi dung ste chos 'byung na// rtswa ni bde byad drung canam// bde ba dpag med sgra chen ldan// chos kyi gaN+DI bkren par gnas// brgyad khri pa ni
131a5(rgyud 'grel): stong chos stong po// sgra bo che ni gsungs rdo rje// mi ga nas phyag rgya chen po la// mya ngan 'das pa chos skye'o// phyogs bcu yul dang yul can te// chos kyi rnga chen rtswa rlung phub// gzugs med chos skya stong pa nyid/
131a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bzang longs sku bde ba che// dam pa ste ni rdo rje'i sku// sna tshogs gzugs can sprul sku'o// yid ni bde chen spros bral las// skyes pa sku lnga'i bdag nyid do// gzugs rnams rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba la// thams
131a7(rgyud 'grel): cad rten dang rten bcas las// brten nas sku bzhi'i snang ba'i dpal// gzugs pad+hA na nyin mtshan brtags bcu bzhi// ma lus 'chang ba thob pa'o// mtshungs pa med ni 'dod yoni lngas// mi gnod 'phel zhing
131a8(rgyud 'grel): cher grags pa// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// bsod nams ye shes tshogs mthar phyin// lam dang 'bras bu gnyis yin no// 'phags pa nyams pa med pa'o// lam ni 'khor lo drug yin no//
131b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mtho ba gtsug tor la// thig le mi nyams gnas pa'o// chos kyi rtog ni rdo rje rtser// rgyas pa po ni bde bas gang // 'jig rten gsu ma ni lus ngag yid// gzhon lus gcig ni gsum pa'i dus// gnas
131b2(rgyud 'grel): brtan sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// rgan po lhan skyes ye shes so// skye dgu'i bdag ni brag dgu bsdams// de yang sbra ma chen po las// mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis// de bzhin sna dang kha dag dang // yid kyis snying
131b3(rgyud 'grel): po dag gi ba ni// seng ge rnam grol phyag rgya tshe// rnal 'byor pa yos bcing bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de las skyes pa'i bde ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// ces pa 'phel 'grib bcu drug go/
131b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug gtum mo'i na chung la// 'khor gsum 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten mig la sogs pa la// shes legros skyon gyis mgos par// ston pa slob dpon zhes brjod do// 'jig rten 'byung ba lnga ldan k+Sha/
131b5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon bzhi pa ster ba ste// de la 'jig pa med pa mchog/ gnyis myed sbyor ba mgon skyob bo// 'jig rten yid btsugs don dam dang // kun rdzob phan tshun mi 'gal ba'o// skyab dang 'bab pa skyob pa ni/
131b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pas ye shes bla na med// nam mkha' mtha' ni shes rab la// longs spyod pa ni gnyis med sbyor// thams cad mthun pa sbyor drug gis// rtogs ma lus pa thob pa las// ye shes mtsho ni zad mi shes// yan
131b7(rgyud 'grel): tan chen pos gang ba'o// ma rig rten 'brel bcu gnyis la// sgo nga'i sbubs ni mi shes bsdums// 'byed pa gsum pa'i ye shes so// yang na lus la sangs rgyas ni// yod pa ma rtogs sgo nga'i sbubs// 'byed
131b8(rgyud 'grel): pa bla mas ye shes spor// 'di de lam mchog yin par gsungs// srid pa'i dra ba mi shes bsgrubs// 'joms pa po ni rtogs pa'o// nyon mongs rtsa ba nye nyon mongs// ma lus zhi byed dga' ba bzhi// dbang bzhi
132a1(rgyud 'grel): las rnyed ye shes bzhi'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgya ste// pha rol phyin pa ye shes rgya// rgya gram gnyis med bde chen po// mchog tu mi 'gyur gang rnyed pa// de ni ye shes dbang
132a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur te/ cod pan can ni gtsug tor smin// rdzogs pa rdo rje nor bu rtse// sangs rgyas bde chen nyams pa med// rgyan du thogs ni bde chen du// ye shes lnga ldan dbu rgyan no// gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum
132a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ sdug bsngal srog rtsol 'tshed sregs myags// sdug bsngal zhi ni rtogs rlung 'gagam// gsum sel dug gsum sel ba'o// mtha' yam lhan cig skyes dga' ba// grol gsum thob ni sku
132a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo// sgrib pas chu me rlung mkha'// rags phra ra ba phra don spyi dang // sems dpa' dang ni bcu pa'o// kun las nges par grol ba ni// du ba la sogs btso thob pa'o// de dus tsam ni nam mkha' ltar//
132a5(rgyud 'grel): lhan skyes mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma gong gi bcu// kun las 'das pa mtha' byin pa'o// de yi dus na lhar skyes dor// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o// de nyid phyag rgya chen por 'dod// sems
132a6(rgyud 'grel): can kun ni spang bya la// klu chen po ni gnyen po ste// dga' bzhi reg dug la sogs pa// 'dod sogs pham byas klu chen po'o// yon tan theg pa chen po la// thod can rnams ni gsang sngags te// thod ces de
132a7(rgyud 'grel): thod 'di yin no// nyon mongs kun las ces pa ni// spong dang thar pa 'dod pa'o// rnam par grol ni bde chen rtogs// rtsol ba med par ngang gis grol// shing thag bsregs pa'i thal phung bzhin// mkha' ltar
132a8(rgyud 'grel): mtha' med bder gnas pa// de nyid yid bzhin nor bu che// mi 'bral ldan pa 'chang ba'o// rin chen zag med bde ba ste// kun mchog phyag rgya chen po la// khyab pa'i bdag ni brtan g.yo la'o// dpag
132b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam shing chen d+hA tI la// rgyas pa rtsa rnams kun du ni// rlung dang thig les khyab pa'o// bum pa bzang po nor bu la// che ba'i mchog ni mi 'dzag bde// de yi byed pa ci zhe na// sems can gdul bya la dgongs nas// kun
132b2(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa bde 'phel ba'o// phan 'dogs yon tan brgyad thob pas// sems can phan pas mnyen bshin pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la// zhes pa phyi rol de bzhin nang // phyi rol rten 'brel bcu gnyis
132b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ ske dang las dang phyogs nad dang // g.yo dang rkan po don rnams dang // ltas dang tshe ched nad rnams dang // kun gyi bya ba shes par 'gyur// nang dag yas g.yon dkyil 'khor lnga// phye nang don rnams sgrub pa'o//
132b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang chu srin bum pa nya// lug dang khyu mchog me thu na// kar ka seng ge bu mo srang // sdig pa gzhu 'dzin bcu gnyis kyis// nyi ma zla ba shes pa'o// de yis rang 'byung la sogs shes// dam shes lus
132b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag ye shes shes// dam ldan shes rab ma la ni// brtsi dang shugs dang drung pa dang // mi 'dzag bde ba dam tshig bzhis// lus sems kun du khyab pa'i bdag/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba las gsungs pa// mgal
132b6(rgyud 'grel): me'i 'khor lo ltar rgyug pa'i// rab tu rgyug cing 'phro ba'i sems// rnam rtog yul la 'dzag pa'i sems// bde bar gzung bar the tsom med// ces gsungs so// sems can dbang shes rab 'brang bzhi//
132b7(rgyud 'grel): dus shes de la dbang bzhi ster// bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas shes// rnam grol gsum dam las ye shes// mkhas pa po ni sa 'og sogs// dbang thob nas ni yon tan gyis// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rnams//
132b8(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing de la ye shes ldan// yon tan shes shes de la brjod// chos shes bkra shis 'jig rten bde// rab bkra shis ni 'jig rten 'das// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// dga' ba rnam pa bcu drug po// nyams//
133a1(rgyud 'grel): su myongs pas grags pa yi// bkra shis snyan grags dge ba thob// chags sogs ma spangs dbugs 'byin che// tshim par byed pa dga' ston che// dga' chen ldan skyes rol pa
133a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i snang ba la// chen po don dam phyag rgya che// bkur sti lus las rtsol ba byed// rim gro rlung las legs sbyor ba// phun sum tshogs pa yon tan thob// mchog tu dga' ba 'jig rten la/
133a3(rgyud 'grel): grags bdag dpal ni lhan cig skyes// mchog ldan ldan skyes yod pa las// mchog sbyin bzhi pa'i gtso bo ste// de nyid skyabs kyi dam pa dang // gnyen por che bas skyabs su 'os// 'jig rten dgra ni dug
133a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste// rab kyi mchog ni bdi stong ngo // de yi 'jigs pa ma lus pa// shin tu med pas sel ba'o// gtsug phud 'khor ba'i badre ba la// phud bu dbang gis rab tu bcings// lcang lo can ni gzhan don du/
133a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing rgyas par 'gengs pa'o// ral pa gnyis su med par sdom// lan tshar cod pan thogs ldan pa'o// gdong lnga ye shes lnga yin te// gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa ni// rigs lnga dag dang ldan pa'o// gnas
133a6(rgyud 'grel): skabs lnga po me tog thogs// shes pa gnas skabs lnga po ni// me log log dang rmi lam dang // rmi lam che drang sad pa'o// me tog thogs pa rdzas 'dzin pa'o// mgo zlu ma kha kha mu kha la// brtul zhugs rnyed
133a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ma rnyed pa// bde ba chen po 'dzin pa ni// tshangs par spyod pa mi nyams pa// brtul zhugs mchog kyang de nyid do// dka' thub nyan thos mthar thug pa// pha rol phyin pa dka' thub che// rdo rje'i theg pa nyid
133a8(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ de nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las su// kha chu tsam zhig zags pa na// mkha' 'gro ma mos rnal 'byor pa// bsgral te khrag ni 'thung bar byed// dmyal ba zhes pa'ang de las 'byung zhes so// gtsang gnas
133b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa ston med pa// go'u tam rigs mnyams// bram ze tshangs pa rig byed yin// snyan dadags srid bsrungs nges brjod dang // mchod sbyin bzhi po tshangs pas shes// mya ngan 'das ni don dam pa// tshangs pa bral ba
133b2(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'o// grol ba stong pa thar pa ni// bde chen spros bral rnam grol lus// rnam grol phyag rgya chen po la// zhi bzhi pa dga' bzhi nyid// de yang he yi rdo rje las// ji ltar me yis tshig pa la// me de nyid kyis
133b3(rgyud 'grel): bdugs te 'tsho// 'dod chags me yis tshig pa la// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol byed// zhes so// mya ngan 'das bachos kyi sku// mya ngan 'grel ni gzugs kyi sgra// rnam par bshad pas de legs
133b4(rgyud 'grel): par/ mya ngan 'das pa thob par te// de ni mtha' bral ye shes so// de yin pa yi rgyu mtshan yang // bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa// zhes pa bde ba dga' mchog dgra'// sdug pa dga' bral dgos pa ste// mthar
133b5(rgyud 'grel): g+hu ldan gyis ye shes so// mi 'dzag dga' ba chags bral la// yul yul ku na las 'das pa'o// theb pa med pa spyad byi la// rgyal bar byas pa dpe med pa// mI mA ngon dga' ba 'gro bar min// mi snang mchog
133b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' chags par min// gsal byed min ni dga' bral la// mi 'gyur lhan cig skyes pa ste// kun 'gro khyab pa po de nyid// pra ning d+hA tA zag med nyams// sa bon rtog pa'i dri ma bral// rdul med chags pa'i rdul med cig
133b7(rgyud 'grel): rdul bral dngos po'i zhen pa spangs// dri ma med pa bzhi pa'i dus// nyes pa spangs pa rang bzhin rigs// skyon med pa ni ma bsgribs pa'o// shin du sad pa dbang dus su/ go rtogs skyes pa de yin la/
133b8(rgyud 'grel): legs par sad ni de nyid dang // ma bral rtag tu ldan pa'o// kun shes gzugs sogs thams cad la// ljon skyes shes pa kun rig pa// dam pa po ni mchog mi 'gyur// rnam par shes pa kun bzhir
134a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ de yang mdo las 'di skad du// thog ma med pa dus kyi dbyings// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te// de yod pas na 'gro kun dang // mya ngan 'das pa 'byung ba yin// zhes/
134a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// bdun po 'gags pa 'od gsal te// 'od gsal rtog med chos nyid 'das// 'das pa gnyis med ye shes de// tshig gi yul min smra brjod bral// de yang he yi rdo rje las// ngag gi lam 'das
134a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul bral// bla ma'i dus mtha' bsten pas shes// tshul 'chang ba ni bla ma yi// dus mtha' bsten pas lhun grub tu// rnam par rtog med ye shes ni// gsum pa'i dus su nyams su myong // 'jig rten kun
134a4(rgyud 'grel): las 'das pa'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas rtogs pa'ang de// las byed pa ni de 'dra bas// rang gzhan gnyis ka smin pa'o// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// ces pa de ni rtogs pa'i don// sangs rgyas rang gi ngo gang la// theg
134a5(rgyud 'grel): ma mkha' 'dra skye ba med// mkha' dang 'dra bas bar du yang // gnas dus nyid nas mkha' dang 'dra// dper na gzugs brlan snang ba bzhin// rgyu lam 'bras bu rnam dag pas// re dogs kun dang bral ba'o// de ltar
134a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i 'thad pa yang // dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// zhes pa dus gsum dag pa'o// de thabs gang las skyes she na// ye shes lhan cig skyes pa la// mig gcig d+hA tI nang yin te// dri med de ru rlung sems
134a7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs/ ye shes lus can bde stong gang // de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid// ma bsten rang lam byon gshegs byed// tshig gi dbang phyug rlung gnas pa// smra ba che ni gsung rdo rje// smra ba'i rlung la dbang phyug thig
134a8(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'i rgyal po rtsar son pa// smra ba'i dam pa gsung rdo rje// mchog gi gsung ni gsung dag pa'o// rlung grub smra ba'i seng ge nyid// nyon mongs rnam dag mtshungs pa med// kun tu lta ba spang blang med// mchog tu
134b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba ye shes snang // gzi brjid gsum mo ye shes la// phreng ba rgyud 'brel goms pa las// blta na sdug ni yon tan thob// 'od bzang 'bar ba sa bon te// dpal gyi be'u bkra shis mtshan// dga' ba 'khyil pa
134b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa ni// lag pas nyams su blangs pa las// 'od 'bar snang ba bde ba'o// dug chen po ni dngos po'i gnod// 'dod chags la sogs gcod chen po// gtso mchog gis ni stong pa nyid// zug rngu rtog bcas
134b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung gnyis po// 'byin pa rlung bsgom bla na med// sman rnams ma lus gnyen po'i tshogs// ljon pa'i shing ni d+hU tI rgyas// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong la// nad ni thog med des mnar ba'o// des na de nyid dgrar che ba'o//
134b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum ni sgo gsum ste// thig le dkar dmar 'dres pa ni// yungs dkar sbom po'i tshad tsam pa// mdzes ni 'bar ba bsgom pa'o// dpal ldan bde chen khams yin te// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can
134b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa/ rgyu ba rtsal skar ma thig/ lus kyi khams rnams bskor ba'o// de yang rtswa thig du zhe na// gtsug tor bzhi pa dpral bcu drug/ nyi shu bad kan mgrin so gnyis// snying gar brgyad de bzhi bcu'o// mkhris
134b6(rgyud 'grel): palte ba drug bcu bzhi// gsang ba bcu drug brgyad cu po// rlung khams cha mnyam nor bu'i bar// bcu drug rigs drug nyi shu gnyis// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'o// rtsa re'i nang na rlung bcu ste// rlung la brten pas
134b7(rgyud 'grel): thig le re// de ltar rtsa rlung thig le la// rkang grags sum stong sum brgya dang // drug cu tha ma pa yin par 'dod// de nyid dpa' bo dpa' mo ni// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ phyogs bcu lus kyi nyid lag la//
134b8(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i mthar thug rlung lnga'i bar// chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes khams// mi 'dzag bde ba legs par 'dzugs// d+hU tI rgyas pa mchog yin no// 'gro la rtsa rlung byang chub sems// gdugs bzhin bde
135a1(rgyud 'grel): chen 'khor lo la// yangs pa mi bzad mdzod yin te// bde ba skyob phyir gdugs shes brjod// de yang sgyu 'phral dra ba las// e baM las ni 'byung ba dang // thabs mang myur dang bde
135a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyo ba dang // 'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyud du 'dod// ces gsungs so// byams pa dang ni snying rje ni// bde chen dkyil 'khor can bdag nyid// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+ma
135a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ kak+ko la zhes rab tu grags// gar gyi bdag ni sbyor thabs kyis// yan lag drug cu rtsa gnyis te// de yang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs yin// khyab bdag chen po thig le la// rin chen gdugs ni nor
135a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rtser// nyon mongs thams cad bsil ba'o// gtum mo che las skyes pa yi// ye shes de la rab tu 'jug/ de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi lam// mchog tu gyur pas rgyal po che// lam des sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// /
135a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur 'chang ba 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas kun gyi lam 'bras la// sbyor bar byed pas rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa ni// bslab gsum yin la de 'di la// ldan pas lhan skyes bstan pa
135a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig/ 'di ni dang po'i dbang bskur te// rdo rje mtha' yas 'du shes dag/ rin chen nye ma tshor ba dag/ dbang bskur dpal ni don yod grub// 'du byed rnam dag kun bdag ni// rnam par snang mdzod gzugs/
135a7(rgyud 'grel): phung dag/ dbang phyug ste ni mi bskyod pa// rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje brtul zhugs kun gyi bdag/ de ltar bsgrub pa'i dbang bcu thob// rdo rje 'chang brgyad gsum
135a8(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ mchog gam kun gyi rje bo'o// de yang gnas rdzas dag dbang dang // yon tan sgrub pa rnams sbyar ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu che ba// zhes pa snod du gyur pa'o// rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur bas//
135b1(rgyud 'grel): skye ba 'drir ni sangs rgyas nyid// ces pa 'di yi don bshad na// bum pas bskyed rims legs gnas khyod// khyod ni 'gro drug gang ma yin// de ni kun brtags yin zhe na// 'di yang kun brtags des na lha//
135b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i drin las rnyed pa yi// ci phyir rin chen ces spras min// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// rjes su 'dzin cing skyong ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// dbang dang rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs//
135b3(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi 'bri las slob dpon che// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// zhes pas gsang ba'i dbang yin te// bla ma yab yum gnyis med las// ye shes dkyil 'khor mngon sprul la// rdo rje nyi ma mtha' yas la//
135b4(rgyud 'grel): de yi bde ba snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba mi bskyod pa// ye shes 'phro 'du dri med 'od// bu yi lce la sbyin par bya// chags bral la sogs chags pa che// zhes pa gsum pa'i dbang yin te// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin rnams la//
135b5(rgyud 'grel): chags bral bla mas mtshon par bya// de ltar minan bla ma nyams// slob ma shin tu 'dod na yang // so sor thar pa spang bar bya// lam 'di lam mchog thub chen gsungs// gang zag rnams la dge slong mchog/ longs
135b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod gnas bsdams nam mkha' mthong // kha dog gnyis med lhan cig skyes// chags pa che ni bu de la// de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las// rigs ldan lo ni bcu drug ma// lang tsho sogs kyis brgyan pa la// dang
135b7(rgyud 'grel): po legs par bslab bya ste// dpral ba la sogs gnas la dgod// sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom par bya// zhes gsungs pa'o// de yi cho ga yang gsungs pa// dang po gso sbyong sbyin par bya// de nas bslab pa'i gnas
135b8(rgyud 'grel): bcu sbyin/ de nas bye brag mdo sde bstan// de nas dbu ma'i tshul lugs sbyin// de rjes dus kyi 'khor lo sbyin// zhes gsungs pas// ka ra na yi bstan bcos kyis// rnal 'byor ma yang rnam pa lnga// bzang mo
136a1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan dung can dang // ri mo can dang glang po can// bla rtsi padad+ma rtsa chu dri dang // nya dang rnag gi dri yi mtshon// phag mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// ma ma kI dang spyan ma'i rigs// lu sa ran
136a2(rgyud 'grel): rked phra rkang lag 'jam// lhung phyed rtse ldan phag mo yi// cung zad lus phra ring zhing mig/ mi g.yo sgra 'khril pad can sgron// 'dod chen ngo tsha med rtsod dga'// thung ba dung can gos dkar mi// ring zhing lus rgyas sku
136a3(rgyud 'grel): srab dang / so mtho thig le lte bur snang // ri mo can te mA mA kI// sgo mthung lus mkhrang shin tu sra// smra brtson spyan ma glang po ma// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yang lnga// seng ge ri dgas rnga glang po// me bskyed don
136a4(rgyud 'grel): grub rin 'byung dang // 'od dpag med dang snang mdzad do// dri ni sngon dang 'dra ba la// dben gnas 'jig med yul dang bral// stong dang sdom brtson mi bskyod rigs// myur du 'gro zhing myur du 'dzag/ skrag cing
136a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa don grub bo// 'dod chen gtong phod gzhan don brtson// gzhan dbang 'gyur ba nyi ma'i rigs// dal bu 'gro zhing mig mi 'gyur// rang bzhin bems po yi yon tan// nye dri 'od dpag med pa'i
136a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs/ shin tu rmongs bzang smra bzhud// rnag dri rnam par snang mdzad rigs// dri med 'od las de skad gsungs// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// shes rab de las byung ba dang // rdo rje skyil
136a7(rgyud 'grel): krung bcas nas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sku bskyed la// sangs rgyas yang dag brjod chos ni// bum pa'i sbyor ba yan lag lnga// 'dus byas bsod nams tshogs kun gyis// rdo rje 'chang gis 'gran med
136a8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ 'dzin pa dbu ma mi rtog ldan// dpal ldan ye shes chen po ste// sangs rgyas pad+ma las skyes pa'o// bzhi pa'i dbang bskur byas pa yis// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/
